Question: Unadjusted for ticket price inflation, it is this person's biggest commercial success to date.
Hints: This person also played the male lead (Jack O' the Green) in Legend (released 1986).
It was while in grade four that this person first became involved in drama, under the tutelage of George Steinburg.
On August 22, 2006, Paramount Pictures announced it was ending its 14-year relationship with this person.
